document_data.name: ''Barkskin Armor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Barkskin Armor''''' was a suit of [[enchanted]] [[hide armor]] imbued with protective ''forest aegis'' magic.{{Template:Cite game/Baldur's Gate III}}
document_data.Description: The hide of this armor was decorated with bark motifs reminiscent of the [[oak]] tree.
document_data.Powers: The ''forest aegis'' that gave the armor its protective quality was similar to that of a permanent ''[[barkskin]]'' [[spell]]. It also improved the wearer's constitution, allowing them to resist any magical or mundane effect that was aimed at the wearer's physique.
document_data.History: One of these sets of hide armor belonged to the [[Harper]] quartermaster named [[Talli]], who followed the High Harper [[Jaheira]] in the [[Shadow-cursed Lands]] in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
